languages.text: "Да, ваши мон-кайские ограничения весьма прискорбны. Однако это не мешает {mf|ему|ей} пытаться вновь и вновь — лишь бы угодить мне".

traits.locale_text: "Да, ваши монкайские ограничения весьма прискорбны. Однако это не мешает {mf|ему|ей} пытаться вновь и вновь — лишь бы угодить мне".

languages.text: "Yes, your mon-keigh limitations are unfortunate. But that does not stop {mf|him|her} from trying again and again — all for a chance to please me."
languages.original_text: "Да, ваши мон-кайские ограничения весьма прискорбны. Однако это не мешает {mf|ему|ей} пытаться вновь и вновь — лишь бы угодить мне".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, your mon-keigh limitations are unfortunate. But that does not stop {mf|him|her} from trying again and again — all for a chance to please me."
"Yes, your mon-keigh limitations are unfortunate. But that does not stop {mf|him|her} from trying again and again — all for a chance to please me."
"Yes, your mon-keigh limitations are unfortunate. But that does not stop {mf|him|her} from trying again and again — all for a chance to please me."
"Yes, your mon-keigh limitations are unfortunate. But that does not stop {mf|him|her} from trying again and again — all for a chance to please me."
"Yes, your mon-keigh limitations are unfortunate. But that does not stop {mf|him|her} from trying again and again — all for a chance to please me."
"Yes, your mon-keigh limitations are unfortunate. But that does not stop {mf|him|her} from trying again and again — all for a chance to please me."

languages.text: 「そうだな。お前のモン＝ケイとしての限界は気の毒だ。だからといって{mf|彼|彼女}は何度も挑み続けるのを止めることはできない。すべては俺を喜ばせるためだからな」
languages.original_text: "Yes, your mon-keigh limitations are unfortunate. But that does not stop {mf|him|her} from trying again and again — all for a chance to please me."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだな。お前のモン＝ケイとしての限界は気の毒だ。だからといって{mf|彼|彼女}は何度も挑み続けるのを止めることはできない。すべては俺を喜ばせるためだからな」

languages.text: "Ja, als Chem-Pan-Sey unterliegt Ihr bedauerlichen Einschränkungen. Das hält {mf|ihn|sie} aber nicht davon ab, es wieder und wieder zu versuchen. Alles nur, um mich zu erfreuen."
languages.original_text: "Yes, your mon-keigh limitations are unfortunate. But that does not stop {mf|him|her} from trying again and again — all for a chance to please me."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, als Chem-Pan-Sey unterliegt Ihr bedauerlichen Einschränkungen. Das hält {mf|ihn|sie} aber nicht davon ab, es wieder und wieder zu versuchen. Alles nur, um mich zu erfreuen."

languages.text: « Il est vrai que les capacités de votre mon-keigh sont fâcheusement limitées, mais ça ne l'empêche pas d'essayer sans relâche de se montrer à la hauteur dans l'espoir de me satisfaire. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, your mon-keigh limitations are unfortunate. But that does not stop {mf|him|her} from trying again and again — all for a chance to please me."

traits.locale_text: « Il est vrai que les capacités de votre mon-keigh sont fâcheusement limitées, mais ça ne l'empêche pas d'essayer sans relâche de se montrer à la hauteur dans l'espoir de me satisfaire. »

languages.text: «Sí, vuestras limitaciones de mon-keigh son lamentables. Pero eso no le impide intentarlo una y otra vez con el ánimo de complacerme».
languages.original_text: "Yes, your mon-keigh limitations are unfortunate. But that does not stop {mf|him|her} from trying again and again — all for a chance to please me."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, vuestras limitaciones de mon-keigh son lamentables. Pero eso no le impide intentarlo una y otra vez con el ánimo de complacerme».

languages.text: “是啊，很遗憾，因为你们猴子存在着方方面面的限制。但即便如此，{mf|他|她}也在一次次尝试，这一切都是为了取悦我。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, your mon-keigh limitations are unfortunate. But that does not stop {mf|him|her} from trying again and again — all for a chance to please me."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，很遗憾，因为你们猴子存在着方方面面的限制。但即便如此，{mf|他|她}也在一次次尝试，这一切都是为了取悦我。”

languages.text: "Maalesef mon-keigh olarak sınırların var ama bu, onu tekrar denemekten alıkoymuyor. Hoşuma gidiyor desem yalan olmaz."
languages.original_text: "Yes, your mon-keigh limitations are unfortunate. But that does not stop {mf|him|her} from trying again and again — all for a chance to please me."

traits.locale_text: "Maalesef mon-keigh olarak sınırların var ama bu, onu tekrar denemekten alıkoymuyor. Hoşuma gidiyor, desem yalan olmaz."

languages.original_text: "Yes, your mon-keigh limitations are unfortunate. But that does not stop {mf|him|her} from trying again and again — all for a chance to please me."
